description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the use-after-free vulnerability in Chromium that impacts Microsoft Edge:

1. Ensure your Microsoft Edge browser is updated to version 120.0.2210.61 or later.
2. To check your current version, click on the three dots (...) in the top-right corner of Edge, navigate to Help and Feedback, and select About Microsoft Edge.

**Details**:
- This security update resolves CVE-2023-6509, preventing potential exploitation of the vulnerability.
- The update is available as part of the standard Microsoft Edge release on December 7, 2023.
- For version information, refer to the release notes found at: https://chromereleases.googleblog.com/2023.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system and Microsoft Edge are up-to-date before proceeding with any security checks.
